txt.en: You have done much to quell the uprising of beasts in Yondershire. The hobbits of Yondershire are grateful for your aid.

Elves and Men hunted the wild beasts of Arassien, the Stag-lands, for many years, and the woodlands echoed with the call of their horns and the stamping of their steeds' hooves on the hard-packed earth. The hunt continues today, though the name of the hunting grounds has been lost to all but scholars, and the woodlands are now simply part of Yondershire.
